DOC.detailed_description: This single arm trial . All Patients receive 6 cycle triple chemotherapy docetaxel , cisplatin S-1 . Given severe toxicity DCF regimen , total dose docetaxel cisplatin reduce 60mg/m2 . For patient CR/PR/SD disease 6 cycle chemotherapy , maintenance therapy S-1 recommend . Antitumor activity evaluate every two cycle accord RECIST1.1 .
